slogan: Connect with people you trust, share the value you create.
project_intro_content: Bondly is a SocialFi platform driven by decentralized finance (DeFi) and social networks. It builds a new social ecosystem where 'interaction is asset, reputation is credit' through staking, social identity, content financialization, and progressive wallet architecture.
vision1: Empower users with sovereignty over content and social assets
vision2: Enable measurable and tradable behavioral value
vision3: Build a user-driven decentralized social platform
share_thoughts: Share your thoughts with the community
reputation_system_great: Bondly's reputation system is really great
interaction_reputation: Through interaction, you gain reputation value, which affects incentives and permissions. This is true decentralized social!
reputation_system_desc: On-chain behavior generates SBT reputation value, affecting incentives and permissions
token_mechanism_desc: Token tightly bound to behavior, not just for governance
architecture_design_desc: Full on-chain interaction + IPFS/Arweave content storage, fully decentralized
username_step_desc: Choose a unique username for your Bondly account
email_step_desc: Enter your email address for account verification
avatar_upload_later: You can upload an avatar later in your profile
username_min_length: Username must be at least 3 characters
username_max_length: Username must be less than 20 characters
username_invalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
step_1_description: Choose a unique username for your Bondly profile
step_2_description: We'll send a verification code to your email
step_3_description: Add a profile picture to personalize your account
continue_exploring: Continue exploring the decentralized social network
first_content_bondly: Just published my first content on Bondly, this platform is really great!
minted_first_nft: Just minted my first content NFT!
content_to_assets: On Bondly, every quality content can become an asset, so cool!
reputation_calculation: Reputation calculation system + level growth mechanism
nft_integration: NFT minting contract integration + SBT reputation binding
dao_governance: DAO governance module integration and arbitration mechanism launch
progressive_login: Build progressive login system + MPC wallet
progressive_login_desc: Progressive login, support email/social accounts → Web3 wallet
value_loop_desc: Content → Interaction → Level → NFT → Token → Re-staking
security_guard_desc: Staking-based interaction threshold mechanism, preventing sybil attacks and volume manipulation
token_mechanism_desc: Token tightly bound to behavior, not just for governance
architecture_design_desc: Full on-chain interaction + IPFS/Arweave content storage, fully decentralized
